title: Yosemite National Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore            The Yosemite Bookstore is operated by the non-profit Yosemite Conservancy, which donates revenues from sales to the National Park Service in Yosemite to support projects and programs that protect and preserve the park. Each purchase you make at a Yosemite Conservancy bookstore benefits Yosemite National Park.
